title: Loopin
description:
Loopin helps you drive great meetings without any effort.

👀 Focus on the conversation while Loopin records the meeting
📝 Stop making notes tirelessly. Get perfect meeting summaries
🔗 Send directly to Hubspot, Slack, Email, or Notion
⭐️ Prepare with recaps sent directly to your inbox
🧠 Chat with your meeting. Never miss any important detail
